title: 【觉得适合新手—蛋白树屋】新手发帖，表喷..
author: Mc蛋白质
txt_content:
大大们，我是新手。这是我第一个做得这么好的树屋存档，请大大们下载欣赏，有不足请提出来，表喷我！谢谢...下面是图片..
房子外面

小麦地准备收割了....想收割的快点下载存档了哦

二楼寝室的装饰，我不会设计..谅解

后面有灯塔，很垃圾啊...[diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem]

replies.author: Mc蛋白质
replies.txt_content:
keroro5690 发表于 2011-11-26 17:30 
对新人要顶一顶
谢谢哦...第一次发帖，那个房子有点SB啊

replies.author: keroro5690
replies.txt_content:
Mc蛋白质 发表于 2011-11-26 17:38 
谢谢哦...第一次发帖，那个房子有点SB啊
你头像那个是憨豆？

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 我说过的，本版发帖版主都帮你们加分。。。
hh 抢沙发 发的飞

replies.author: 夕风
replies.txt_content: 我刚开始玩的时候也不知道怎么造好，就从模仿一些觉得好看的作品开始，然后后面就好很多乐。

replies.author: asdnow
replies.txt_content: 内个农场其实土可以多点的 我都是这样的[water][farmland][farmland][farmland][farmland][water]

replies.author: asdnow
replies.txt_content: 只是收割有点不方便 极限貌似是[water][farmland][farmland][farmland]

replies.author: ZATMO
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ZATMO 于 2011-12-1 00:53 编辑 

1.0的话有个远程回收。。。
3格的话应该能照顾的

或者农地与水再挖深一格，播种会比较方便
水就远离自己。。。
